summary: Veterinary surgery case tracking log built on the Internet Computer (ICP) backend. Cases are stored in a Motoko canister. Currently fixing empty-state handling on Dashboard and Cases pages, and addressing duplicate agent initialization warnings.
architectural_notes: Cases are stored in an Internet Computer (ICP) Motoko canister backend
Frontend uses createActor with agent; duplicate agentOptions warning indicates agent and agentOptions are both being passed — agentOptions should be removed
Dashboard and Cases pages must handle empty canister state gracefully with a clean empty-state UI
known_issues: Cases not loading on Dashboard and Cases pages when canister database is empty — UI does not handle empty state
Duplicate agent initialization: both agent and agentOptions passed to createActor, agentOptions is ignored
Manifest icon error: IMG_4505.ico has incorrect resource size

existing_features.title: Fix the Dashboard page to gracefully handle an empty canister database: when the React Query hook returns an empty array (zero cases), display a clean empty state UI (e.g., an illustrated or icon-based message such as 'No cases yet — add your first surgery case') instead of a blank/broken list.

Fix the Cases list page (CasesListView) to gracefully handle an empty canister database: when the React Query hook returns an empty array, display a clean empty state UI consistent with the Dashboard empty state, rather than a blank list.

new_feature_requests.summary: Resolve the duplicate agent initialization warning: 'Detected both agent and agentOptions passed to createActor. Ignoring agentOptions and proceeding with the provided agent.' Ensure that createActor is called with either agent or agentOptions, not both simultaneously.
